preference.name: ItemRevision_TCPublishingPage_default_relation
preference.preference_description: Used for configuring Teamcenter manufacturing process management technical portfolios. Defines the default relation created when a publishing page is pasted within an item revision. Valid Values: Accepts multiple strings as values. Each string must be a valid Teamcenter relation.
